channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1656; 08:11PM; 235 S Berendo St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wulJJH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wulJJH</a>; #Koreatown; It took 57 firefighters just 15 minutes to extinguish all flames on the second floor of a 3-story, 24-unit apartment building constructed in 1927. The fire was contained to a single unit, with surrounding units protected from any fire extension. No injuries were reported, though all 24 units have been evacuated after residents initially sheltered in place. Berendo Street and 3rd Street will be closed to traffic in the vicinity for approximately one hour. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E203 E211 E220 E229 E27 E29 E52 E6 EM11 HR3 RA6 RA806 RA813 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#1656; 08:11PM; 235 S Berendo St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wulJJH" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wulJJH</a>; #Koreatown; Initial arriving companies report a 3-story apartment building with units surrounding a center hallway; fire is showing from one unit on the second floor. Crews will be in the offensive mode, actively fighting fire and searching for any persons that need rescue.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 E11 E211 E229 E52 E6 RA6 RA813 T11 T29; CH9; 14; Lyndsey Lantz

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Semi-trailer Collision and Fire 05/08/2024 INC#0797

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Semi-trailer Collision and Fire; INC#0797; 12:17PM; SB 5 x 405; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy</a>; #GranadaHills; 80 firefighters spent 38 minutes in a coordinated effort to confine and extinguish flames in one of two semi-trailers involved in this collision on the southbound 5 Freeway, just north of the 405 transition. One male driver successfully escaped his burning cab, and passing motorists stopped to help extinguish the flames on his clothes and body. Upon LAFD arrival, he was transported by rescue ambulance to a local trauma center with critical burns. No other injuries or patients were reported, as the other semi-trailer was parked on the shoulder with no occupants at the time of the collision. While foam was used to extinguish the fire, fuel and oil runoff was contained to the immediate area and then remediated, preventing any further threat to immediate surroundings or storm drains. Media inquiries: CHP Log 1309. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC731 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E290 E75 E77 E88 E91 E98 EM12 EM14 H1 HA1 JT1 JT2 PI4 RA18 RA87 RA90 RA91 SO1 SQ21 SQ87 T75 T87 T90 T98 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz

title.a: Semi Truck Collision and Fire 05/08/2024 INC#0797

item.description: Semi Truck Collision and Fire; INC#0797; 12:17PM; SB 5 x SAN DIEGO FREEWAY; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Ux2lUy</a>; #GranadaHills ; Two semi trucks were involved in a collision. One semi is on fire, with an associated patient burned and in critical condition. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC731 E18 E275 E287 E75 E77 E88 EM12 JT1 RA18 RA87 RA91 SQ87 T75 T87 T98 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Lyndsey Lantz
Test Only; 12:04PM; This is a test of LAFD's alerting system. Test is complete. No action required.; Lyndsey Lantz

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1342; 07:30PM; 4738 W Venice Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ</a>; #MidCity; Firefighters extricated one person from a two-vehicle collision, using hydraulic rescue tools. There were a total of 6 patients, and 5 were treated and transported to area hospitals by LAFD. The following are the age/gender/condition of the transported patients: 51F and 62F - critical, 51M - serious, 40F and 13F - moderate. One 46M declined transport, with only minor injuries. Additional circumstances unknown. Nothing further.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E26 E261 E61 E68 EM11 EM5 EM9 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA34 RA61 RA62 RA829 RA858 RA861 T26 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Sinking Vessel; INC#1240; 06:40PM; Los Angeles Harbor; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QUVrYj" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QUVrYj</a>; #SanPedro; LAFD Fire Boats are working on flipping the vessel upright and towing it to the launch ramp. All six people who were rescued off the sinking vessel, and brought to shore by LA County Lifeguards, are in good condition and none required hospital transport. LAFD will assist them back to their vehicles. Nothing further.; FS 111; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District outside city; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E112 E248 E36 RA101 RA112 T48; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1342; 06:30PM; 4738 W Venice Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wuTFFZ</a>; #MidCity; PRELIM: Two-vehicle traffic collision involving a pedestrian. One person trapped. Firefighters are initiating medical care and extrication operations.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E226 E26 E261 E61 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 T26 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 06:25PM; 20900 W Saticoy St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5</a>; #Winnetka; Firefighters responded to a 3-vehicle collision with no entrapment. Seven people were assessed by firefighters and paramedics on scene. One 17-year-old female refused transport. The other six patients were transported to area hospitals in good-to-fair condition, all with minor injuries. The ages and genders of those transported are: 18-month-old male, 34F, 25M, 12M, 14F, and 17F. Nothing further.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E72 EM15 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA828 RA896; CH8; 13 18; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1265; 05:45PM; 20900 W Saticoy St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3QsjSf5</a>; #Winnetka; LAFD is on scene of a three-vehicle collision with at least seven patients requiring medical assistance. LAPD Inc #3270.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E72 EM15 RA72 RA828 RA896; CH8; Nicholas Prange
